value:
$WmMPID_比翼パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_FF_Pair,Face|Are you all right, Princess Minerva?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Yes, I'm fine. Thank you. Now, let's
hang back and wait for opportunity
to launch a counterattack.$k$pIt is what my brother would do.
And he wouldn't give up, either,
no matter what...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Princess Minerva of Macedon... You
and your brother trained from birth
to walk the path of royalty.$k$pYou want the same thing...to bring
prosperity to your country and
happiness to your people.$k$pSuch a shame. You two might have
overseen a golden age, if not for...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|...If not for what?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, looks like time for talk is almost
up—sorry. How about showing me
what you know of warcraft, hm?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_FF_Pair,Face|We'll cover you, Minerva.$k$p$nMPID_カチュア|We're at your command.$k$p$nMPID_エスト|Yeah, let's go!$k$p$Sbs1000|
$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03_2,0|$WmMPID_幼少ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Before01,Face|Excellent. But we're not done yet.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_FF_Pair,Face|Right. This way, Princess Minerva!$k$p$Sbs150|
